channel.title: node-red on Hugo's IT journal
channel.description: Recent content in node-red on Hugo's IT journal

item.title: Node Red
item.description: Official Website Playlist a visual editor to build workflow and ui application to interact with IoT wire the IoTs and user (with web dashboard) read data from IoT write data to IoT (control it, on and off etc) build a flow among IoTs and users for automation build dashboard UI all can be done by drag and drop
